featured.text: Continuous as the stars that shine And twinkle on the Milky Way, They stretched in never-ending line Along the margin of a bay:
" So we went to the restaurant and sat by a window (38) the bay.

definition.zh_def: 灣，指海洋或湖泊的一部分，通常有弧形的海岸線。
definition.en_def: A bay is a body of water partially enclosed by land, typically with a wide opening to the sea.
definition.example: The boat sailed into the calm bay to avoid the storm.
